name: [Ludum Dare 34] The Bulb
description:
Just a tiny game I made for the Ludum Dare 34 compo event. It's not really fun in the end but it's playable and at least it's something !

I started thinking about Warioware Inc., the GBA game, but my lack of graphist abilities made me lost a lot of time. I should have pick a simpler design.

Finding a gameplay idea was quite hard and i'm not really satisfied with what i made. On the other hand, the compo was a good experience and i'm sure i'll do something better next time !
